title.en: A Short Prayer Based on the Life and Liberation of the All-Knowing, All-Seeing Jamyang Khyentse Wangpo

text.en: Namo guru mañjughoṣāya!
Crown adornment of all the holders of the teachings in the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: gangjong tendzin yong kyi tsuk gi gyen

text.en: All-seeing Jamyang Khyentse Wangpo,
text.en-trans: künzik jamyang khyentsé wangpo ni

text.en: You were born into the Nyö family in Terlhung in Derge.
text.en-trans: derge ter lhung nyö rik ku trung shing

text.en: You followed1a hundred and fifty authentic teachers,
text.en-trans: tsenden lama gya dang ngabchu ten

text.en: And received more than seven hundred volumes of the Sarma and Nyingma teachings.
text.en-trans: sar nying chö tsul pö chen düngya sen

text.en: Without sectarian bias, you revitalised the teachings of all schools
text.en-trans: ridral drubta kün gyi ten sok zung

text.en: And maintained the vital points of each individual tradition,
text.en-trans: sol luk sosö sok né zinpa yi

text.en: So that numerous eminent masters appeared—such is your kindness, sublime one.
text.en-trans: dampa mang jön kyechok di yi drin

text.en: Who else has been such a protector? Of such service to the stream of teachings?
text.en-trans: di lé ten gyün penpé gön su zhik

text.en: Your activity has permeated the entire world.
text.en-trans: di yi trinlé gyü né sa chen khyab

text.en: In particular, you sedulously received the whispered transmissions passed down without interruption
text.en-trans: khyepar drubwang tangtong gyalpo né

text.en: From the lord of siddhas Thangtong Gyalpo himself,
text.en-trans: da bar machepé nyengyü nam

text.en: And applied them perfectly in practice.
text.en-trans: nenten nö né tuk nyam lek tar té

text.en: You held the Whispered Transmission of Secret Conduct to be
text.en-trans: damngak zhen lé sangchö nyengyü la

text.en: More effective than other instructions; you nurtured fortunate disciples
text.en-trans: khepar zhal gyi zhé né kalden kyang

text.en: And became a master of these Whispered Transmission teachings.
text.en-trans: nyengyü di yi tenpé dakpo drub

text.en: The fivefold cycle of essential sādhanas,2
text.en-trans: tangtong drubtab nyingpo kor nga dang

text.en: The Essence of the Mahāsiddha's Wisdom Mind,3Kagyé, Mahākāla and  the rest—
text.en-trans: drubtob tuk tik kagyé gönpo sok

text.en: Indivisible from the master in his wisdom form,
text.en-trans: yeshe kuchen dé dang yermé par

text.en: You received the patrimonial blessings of these mind-direct transmission as they were transferred into your wisdom mind.
text.en-trans: gonggyü jinlab pa pok tuk la pö

text.en: The tenfold lineage of exposition, the eight chariots of the practice lineage,
text.en-trans: shé gyü chu dang drubgyü shingta gyé

text.en: The seven major transmissions and especially
text.en-trans: kabab dün dang khyepar tangtong pé

text.en: The five and eight transmissions of Thangtong Gyalpo—
text.en-trans: kabab gyé dang kabab ngaden gyi

text.en: Supreme teacher of them all, Ösal Trulpé Dorje, to you I bow.
text.en-trans: tön chok ösal trulpé dorjér dü

text.en: With vast wisdom you saw the crucial points of all the teachings,
text.en-trans: khyen rab chenpö yongdzok ten né zik

text.en: With vast love you brought countless disciples to maturity,
text.en-trans: tsewa chenpö drangmé dulja min

text.en: With vast power you drove away malevolent barbarians—
text.en-trans: nütu chenpö lalo dukchen dok

text.en: Great scholar and adept, inspire me with your blessings!
text.en-trans: khedrub chenpo khyé kyi jingyi lob
